title: PMS 2.0 775 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Von Miller, TVG Mike Joyce, Coach P's Keys With Chuck Pagano LIVE From The ThunderDome, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, Darius Butler, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about the news that the Washington Commandeers appear as if they will be sold with Jeff Bezos and Jay-Z both showing interest, and look ahead to tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Eagles and the Texans. Joining the progrum to preview this weekend's Breeders Cup is horse expert TVG Mike (1:21:01-1:34:46). Next, 2x Super Bowl Champion, Super Bowl MVP, future Hall of Famer, Defensive End for the Buffalo Bills, Von Miller joins the progrum for his weekly hit to chat about a big win over the Packers, what the Dolphins are getting in Bradley Chubb, why he thinks Brandon Beane is such a good GM, and much more (2:11:50-2:30:14). Later, former Head Coach of the Indianapolis Colts, Chuck Pagano gives his keys to victory for both the Eagles (1:42:00-2:11:48) and the Texans (2:30:16-2:51:51) in his weekly Coach P's Keys segments. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
